sense.name: the day before today
sense.commentary: The day immediately before today. Twenty-four hours ago.
sense.examples: I walked to the bank yesterday, but it was closed. It seems like just yesterday that I fell down the stairs. It was in yesterday's newspapers.

sense.name: the past
sense.commentary: The past as a general concept. Usually the recent past.
sense.examples: Yesterday's solutions aren't going to work on the problems of today. The world of yesterday is a dark, scary place filled with barbarians. Historians are more concerned with yesterday than tomorrow.
